entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
